title: S13 Ep67: This House is Haunted! The TRUE story of The Enfield Poltergeist
itunes:title: This House is Haunted! The TRUE story of The Enfield Poltergeist
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS finds out, This House is Haunted! The TRUE story of The Enfield Poltergeist with original investigator Guy Lyon Playfair

Tonight we continue to reexamine the famous Enfield Poltergeist case with the late Guy Lyon Playfair as we pay a final tribute to the man with his final appearance on our show.

This is one of THE most documented public cases of Poltergeist Activity ever recorded with dozens of eyewitnesses, from friends & neighbors to law enforcement and media! Plus a startling admission about the Warren's involvement in the case.

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio
